meanings.definition: Oogenies: the female reproductive cells in animals
meanings.sent1: The oogenies in the bird's body are essential for laying eggs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study oogenies to understand how new life begins in animals.
meanings.sent3: The oogenies in the hen were so excited to become eggs that they started a party.
meanings.sent4: Her oogenies were like tiny seeds of life waiting to bloom into chicks.
meanings.sent5: The miracle of birth starts with the oogenies, the tiny building blocks of life.

meanings.definition: Oogenies: the process of egg cell formation in animals
meanings.sent1: During oogenies, egg cells develop and mature in the ovaries.
meanings.sent2: Understanding oogenies helps in comprehending the reproductive cycle of animals.
meanings.sent3: The oogenies were so busy creating egg cells that they forgot to take a break.
meanings.sent4: The intricate dance of oogenies transforms simple cells into potential life.
meanings.sent5: In the magical world of oogenies, cells transform into the promise of new beginnings.
